website_summaries.verdict: Mechanically superior with unique coffee customization features that satisfies the tastes of many.
pros: Engineered for one-touch ease of use while providing features such as coffee mug height adjustments
Appeals to former baristas and those with international coffee palates
cons: Will need to keep an empty cup nearby to prevent mess that may be caused by the self-cleaning feature

customer_reviews.title: Jura warranty
customer_reviews.text: The machine is ok. But beware if you buy it from Amazon wharehouse that Jura sees that as a purchase from a third party. So you don't have the jura warranty coverage. Just had to send mine back for a prorated refund of $150.00 less than what we paid for it. Marvin Hartgraves
customer_reviews.author: marvin  hartgraves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee!
customer_reviews.text: After extensive researching of current high(er) end coffee machines, I purchased the Jura C65 to replace my Jura F7 - which had finally failed after 11 years of reliable service. Set-up was fast and easy -- instruction booklet is well organized with useful diagrams. Am completing the 1st week of daily use: so far so good. The C65 produces excellent coffee. Controls are less complicated than my old F7, and it is easy to adjust to fit individual tastes -- strength, cup size, temperature, etc. Only fret is reliability -- will it match the duration of the F7?
customer_reviews.author: Robert iMac User

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was somewhat apprehensive about purchasing this, but 2 weeks in very satisfied with our purchase. The coffee and espresso quality is excellent. Pleasantly surprised with the milk steamer, the lattes I’ve made are as good as any big coffee shop. It’s also easy to maintain and clean, takes about 2 minutes everyday. I can’t imagine a machine being easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley and Zachary Lund

customer_reviews.title: just a darn good cup a' of strong
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment - My lovely wife bought it for me to replace a 2002 Capresso machine which gave me 5 cups a coffee for 17 years (That's 30,000+ cups!!!). I don't do anything fancy with it, just a darn good cup a' of strong, black coffee....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso ever!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I love this coffee/espresso maker! I've never been able to drink cappuccinos because steamed milk kills my tummy. I bought lactose free milk and can now enjoy steamed milk. It also makes incredible iced caramel coffees. I poor espresso over ice, add a tiny bit of caramel protein drink( I don't like really sweet coffee drinks) and some lactose free milk. Super creamy and a slightly sweet...yummy
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Unit
customer_reviews.text: The machine shows out of coffee beans when it is full. Also, it starts grinding beans after I hit espresso, but before I input the strength or size of the cup. It would have no way to know how much beans to grind until those two factors were input. Lastly, it has one knob to select the type of coffee, strength, and amount. That is frustrating because you have to keep rotating the knob in different directions to make the different inputs. It should allow separate input options before making the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Roth

customer_reviews.title: Gets Clogged easily
customer_reviews.text: Gets clogged easily. Have been using the same coffee beans for the past 9 years with my previous Jura Ena 9. Changed the grinder setting to coarse but no help. Not sure if the machine is defective. But for $1000, shipping it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Nononsense

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Jura Design.
customer_reviews.text: My Jura Ena 9 was Lost in a fire. I purchased the c65. I was disappointed in many ways but it stopped working after a few uses. The instruction booklet that came with it was difficult to follow. The coffee styles was limited. I did like the water container on the left side as it held more water than my old Ena 9. I sent the unit back and will purchase the Ena 9 again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Sent back to Jura with no response.
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Sent back to Jura for repair. It’s been a week and we have heard nothing. Calls to Jura send you to a voice mail. Not sure yet how we will get our money back.
customer_reviews.author: O. Nash

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THE C65 (DISCONTINUED) AS IT APPEARS THEY ARE UNLOADING INVENTORY ON AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THE C65 (DISCONTINUED) AS IT APPEARS THEY ARE UNLOADING INVENTORY ON AMAZON. I PURCHASED A C65 FROM JURA VIA AMAZON AND IT HAS BEEN BACK TO THE REPAIR FACILITY TWICE. I ASK FOR A REPLACEMENT MACHINE GIVEN IT WAS NEW AND THEY SAID NO, THE C65 WAS DISCONTINUED AND YOU CAN ONLY GET A REPAIR... FOR A COFFEE MACHINE THAT COST OVER 1,000 THAT IS CRAZY CUSTOMER SERVICE WHEN THE MACHINE IS ONLY A FEW MONTHS OLD! WHEN THE MACHINE IS WORKING, I LOVE IT, BUT ITS A DISCONTINUED MODEL AND ITS NOT WORKING.
customer_reviews.author: Carrington Wilmer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine -- even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this six months ago and I could not be happier. Makes better coffee than I've ever had at home, and I've been a coffee drinker for many decades. Simple to operate (as long as you have the easy-to-read manual) and just makes a superb cup of coffee, or a latte, or cappuccino, or simple espresso -- whatever you want, with no more than a press or two of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Can't steam.
customer_reviews.text: This machine does not get milk hot enough when you steam milk. Very disappointing. Waste of $1000.
customer_reviews.author: Anne777T

customer_reviews.title: Great machine-I’ve had many different ones over the years. Slight learning curve initially.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in Geneva Switzerland and fell in love with this machine! Replaces my Nespresso vertuoline coffee maker! So good & saving so much money using coffee beans instead of pods that were costing me $1.33 per cup!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of problems.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good cup of coffee When It Works. 4 months old and has been replaced or sent back for repair twice. Generally unacceptable for such an expensive machine. Customer service very good, but hauling this unit back and forth to UPS is time consuming and annoying. It is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Lynn Carey

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait to buy this, buy it now and be forever in coffee heaven.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t need to go to coffee house ever again. This machine is our new best friend. We like it almost as much as our kids, some days more so. Don’t know how we survived without it. Had so diner coffee yesterday, tasted like dishwater. SPOILED FOREVER.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin johnson

customer_reviews.title: Brand name
customer_reviews.text: Saw one like at a friends, if you like coffee and want to get brand name coffee taste from a Latte place, this is your answer, you will never have to buy a 5 dollar latte again, make it at home and head off to work, you'll have the machine paid off in 6 months or less.
customer_reviews.author: George N.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite model of Jura
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a couple of Jura models - this is the easiest to use and clean. I had to return it once within a year, but after that I have had no problem. Seriously, when I wake up, this machine pulls me out of bed imagining the cappuccino I'll have within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this coffee machine. It's eating my coffee and there;s no way to fix it. Don't buy this coffee machine!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flute Player

customer_reviews.title: Jura is the coffee maker for hard core coffee drinkers!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Jura coffee makers this is the third one I bought for gifts ... this is a less expensive version but for someone that does not need all the bells and whistles this makes awesome coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have A Jura!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a luxury purchase but worth every penny! Best tasting coffee, at home, any time and the fact it is fully automated is such a pleasure. Highly recommend without anything negative to report. If you're looking for high end, nothing compares to a Jura!
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: From sublime to sublime to sublime to sublime...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, value for money if you appreciate anything Swiss. Paired with Lavazza super créma this machine is just sublime. Yes i learned a new word1
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: don't good
customer_reviews.text: after 3 month nonstop write "filter" I change filter write this same after 4 month one time work coffe some time no I call to insurance company don't neded say for me Very bad product big money bad product
customer_reviews.author: Marek Goralczyk

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for the office
customer_reviews.text: I don't drink coffee but everyone in the office loves this. We had a Keurig prior to this.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Simple operation
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old impressa 9 with the 65. Simple operation. I ordered the thermos milk tank and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: This is the best machine, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Was received perfectly carefully packed. This is the best machine, easy to clean, because you don't have to guess what to do, it tells you what to do. Coffee is great! I will be buying another one for our company.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Fischer

customer_reviews.title: poor grinding unit
customer_reviews.text: When this machine works it makes a great espresso. However, often it will not feed beans into grinder and will make weak 1960s diner coffee. Jura needs to address this problem. It happens with any Peets I have tried whereas my old Gaggia never missed a grind cycle with the same beans.
customer_reviews.author: Rio Geo

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Use to use cream in our coffee, not anymore! Great coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Penny H.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee. Have had for 2 years, makes 4-8cups of great coffee daily without problems. Milk foamer user occasionally and a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: adqak

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Simple to customize & use! Great value at this price point for a Jura! The very best manufacturer (my 3rd Jura).
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper44

customer_reviews.title: dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: i have had to send this back 3 times now. it works great for a couple of weeks then it makes weak coffee. while customer service is good about getting it shipped back and fourth, clearly the factory is unable to fix issuses. figure for $ 1200, i could have something that doesnt break down every two weeks
customer_reviews.author: ct coffee

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to learn how to master it. Coffee is great, better flavor than the stardust one. After a month of daily use no problems so far. It will pay for itself after few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished, think twice. Lukewarm but awesome coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This made awesome coffee, like seriously awesome. My problem was I bought a refurbished machine for a few bucks off and the coffee came out lukewarm:( had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amberjones2k

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite thing.
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is that it makes all other coffee taste like crap.
customer_reviews.author: Richard miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup if you've owned one but may take the ...
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a Jura E8 in 2004 as a gift when I was still married. Lost it in the divorce and have wanted one since 2014. This works similarly plus they have made some design improvements. Easy setup if you've owned one but may take the newbie a little longer to figure it out. Brewed the first cup and it's better than the previous one. Even if it requires an overhaul after five years like my previous one, it is well worth the $250 or so. My cuisinart coffee center that is only two years old is dying a slow death. I will always have a Jura, highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: MickOC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you like coffee this is the machine. Wonderful coffee, fast. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great cup of coffee and espresso
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great cup of coffee and espresso. Frother is not very impressive and would recommend a standalone unit if you enjoy foam and froth with your coffee as my wife does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good machine but weak frother
customer_reviews.text: It is a good machine but frother is not the most powerful
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Mangla

customer_reviews.title: Received an old machine
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $1000 and I received a REAL old USED PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: MIke A.

customer_reviews.title: The CREMEEEEEE
customer_reviews.text: Seriously better than any of the coffee shops in town... there is something great to the brewing process happening quick and immediately after the beans are ground... you really get all of that freshness and the flavor.... this is an expensive coffee machine, but it will save you a lot of money and a lot of paper cups when you realize you don't even want to go to starbucks or the local cafe anymore. And the Creme ... the Creme is unbelievable, naturally creamy, so naturally you don't really need to add cream!
customer_reviews.author: gypsyeyes1984

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love it! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We had an S9 for several years and just replaced it with this one. We absolutely love it! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's a very straightforward machine not a lot of options etc. but it's simplicity is its beauty
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use coffee right now is absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great Machine! Does everything it's supposed to including making great coffee drinks and the second one arrived without damage :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coffee machine for serious coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is exactly what I wanted. Delicious, strong, HOT coffee with the press of a button. Easy to clean and I must say perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very easy setup and a great cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup and a great cup of coffee. Machine can be a little needy but it insures maintenance occurs in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Shockley

customer_reviews.title: the best coffee
customer_reviews.text: It makes the best coffee ever! I had a problem with milk frothier but Amazon replaced it in one day! wow. Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: Anna FamilyBeautyBox

customer_reviews.title: ... have two of the Jura Impressa coffee machines and love them both
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of the Jura Impressa coffee machines and love them both. If you love coffee and want it fresh and strong this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: In the first 2 weeks, our office made 400 ...
customer_reviews.text: In the first 2 weeks, our office made 400 cups of coffee. The machine requires a cleaning every two hundred cups: we cleaned it twice during those first days. Our coffee roaster is thrilled with us, since we are buying much more coffee than before! This machine makes marvelous coffee. #theadminassistantsbestfriend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this model should be recalled
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this machine for a few months now, and I am very disappointed. I owned a similar model in the past and loved it (the one thing I've regretted losing in my divorce). The main problem is that the coffee beans will not slide down to the grinder, so even if the receptacle is full, you will have to push the beans manually after a few coffees. This machine should actually be recalled for that very reason. Also, I've paid more for the C65 "Platinum" model, only to discover that the C60 model is EXACTLY the same, but without the silver details.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our JURA very much it is as we had hoped for and expected.We would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ruth b stewart

customer_reviews.title: Typical Maintenance cost and filter cost.
customer_reviews.text: I'm liking very much our new member to the family "Jura" I have been hearing though from a previous owner of a Jura that they moved on to another Barista type for the reason that the maintenance cost typically required for a Jura is typically $200.00 dollars and upwards pending on a fix so with that I'll make that decision when the time comes. With coffee typically priced at Starbucks and Pete's I will have to factor in the math when looking at future maintenance cost so other than that I am happy with my Jura. Hope this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quite expensive but the coffee is great. Also the handling is quite easy
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive but the coffee is great. Also the handling is quite easy. Just one star less for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sascha S.

customer_reviews.title: This is my Third jura. The first two were ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my Third jura. The first two were refurbished machines. One bought in 2007, another one also refurbished for our lake home. This is the first new machine I have bought as my main one finally died. So far I am the only one using it. Fairly tech oriented, but it has taken me several tries to adjust the volume for the cups, and the energy saving program. I just received it yesterday, so this is just a preliminary eval!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: very nice machine!..we are very happy with this purchase:) my husband is addicted!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This machine would not power up right from the box. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: IAC

customer_reviews.title: The worst experience of Jura machine
customer_reviews.text: Last 10 years of enjoyment from Jura E8 was suddenly ended. So I purchased this Jura C65. However after 2 weeks of normal usage , 4 to 5 cups per day, the quality of coffee start to go down hill with less crema and thin mild taste. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jets

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, simple, flavorful
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent machine. Its set-up was easy. The range of options offered (degree of grinding, strength of aroma, type of coffee) just does the trick for us. The machine cleans itself, the frother's manual cleaning causes no difficulty. Most importantly, it makes excellent coffee, espresso, and cappuccino. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ogel

customer_reviews.title: When your Cuban neighbors come over and ask for a ...
customer_reviews.text: When your Cuban neighbors come over and ask for a cup of coffee from your Jura, you know you have the right machine.
customer_reviews.author: Out Of Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Best Cup of Coffee Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had used a Jura one day at a car dealership and thought dang, that sure was a great cup of coffee. We talked about that cup of coffee for 2 weeks. I wanted one so bad but just couldn’t justify the price. After we figured up how much money we were spending on K-cups ($400-500 a year) and a couple of Keurigs ($125 each) we decided to bite the bullet and buy this wonderful coffee maker. We’ve only had it about 3 weeks, but dang, what an amazing cup of coffee it is. Highly recommend. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Cathy Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Jura coffee machine. It makes fabulous coffee which I look forward to enjoying every day! I also purchased the milk steamer attachment and caraf which truly makes coffee house style lattes!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Riegel

customer_reviews.title: Machine doesn't work !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it new. Plugged the machine in the electric plug, pushed the On & Off button and NOTHING happens. The machine does NOT turn on, the machine does NOT work ! At those prices this is pathetic !! Not exactly what you'd expect from the "best coffee machine". And , of course : no one there to answer the phone. Lousy machine, lousy "client service" !!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra93101

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee ever. Worth the price. I believe it in the long run is cheaper than a keurig. No pods, just beans and no landfill nightmare with expensive plastic pods. Better tasting coffee by far.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY PEARCE

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine almost a year ago. It has been a great machine. It has saved me a ton of money and I can get coffee anytime throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Din Bui

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, easy to use, great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older machine that finally died. Setup, daily use, and maintenance couldn’t be easier and coffee is excellent as always.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: once you get the hang of the setup it's fantastic. FWIW "touch" a button sometimes means "tap and hold." other than that 5+ stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy delicious morning coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Freshly ground, brewed coffee with each cup. So easy to use. I’ve had one for years and this purchase was a gift for my daughter. Jura’s customer service is great if needed.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: 2 returns in 90 days
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas. The first one that was shipped in December needed to be returned because the steamed milk button was broken. So we boxed it back up, and sent it in. Awesome return process by Amazon. However, after getting the second replacement machine, this one has now broken. The on/off button has broken rendering the machine useless. It's a great machine when it works, but two major problems in less than 90 days requiring shipping the product back. Based on my experience, I would say buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JoseyWales

customer_reviews.title: Product may be defective (or may be not?)
customer_reviews.text: This espresso machine is great and cheaper than the one I had previously (Mille), however, 3 weeks after purchasing it, had a problem. Sent it to repair and they sent me a different machine... 4 months later that second machine had the exact same problem of the original, so I had to send it again for repair. jura's repair/tech service has been great, however, it is a hassle and you don't expect a new product to fail twice in such a short time! I would like to believe it just was a co incidence and not a defective model! When working, the coffee and espresso are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: ... except the grinder
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for several months. Everything works very well, except the grinder. The grinder will lose contact with the coffee beans and grind nothing, even though there are beans in the bean hopper. This leads to having to abort the coffee making and throw away the cup of coffee. This to me is a major fault. One should just fill the bean hopper and only be concerned that there are beans in the hopper. This appears to be in a design error. I am not sure if Jura is aware of this but they should be.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis L. Penner

customer_reviews.title: Smell the coffee!
customer_reviews.text: 6 months use a we couldn't be happier. Simple to operate and great coffee
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have one. Got this one for my son. Just awesome
customer_reviews.author: Gertie

customer_reviews.title: Not very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a Valentine's present for my super stressed out husband, however we couldn't resist and fired this baby up early. What a surprise. My husband thinks there is something wrong with the heating element because our espresso never got HOT. He fooled around with the settings and even researched online, but luke warm was the best we could get. What a disappointment! It's going back. We did reheat what was produced and it was just alright which i am sure was a result of our reheating. Certainly a big dissappointment and probably not worth $1000.
customer_reviews.author: curt frailey

customer_reviews.title: Day one and I'm totally unimpressed.
customer_reviews.text: The grinder is hit and miss. For example, I'm prompted to fill the coffee bean chamber even when it's full. Other times, it makes coffee colored water. The coarseness setting, using the dial, does nothing to change the texture of the ground coffee. It's all very frustrating considering I paid over a thousand dollars for this thing. Strangely as well, the coffee doesn't come out piping hot, like the manual says it does. It also states the temperature even affects the flavor in a positive way, and then makes coffee that's 115*f. I might come back to revisit this, if somehow it figures itself out.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quality coffee with a quieter experience
customer_reviews.text: This a great coffee maker. My partner who is the coffee drinker of the two of us, really likes the flavor and temperature of the espressos it churns out. Also, the grinder is much quieter than our old DeLonghi that we had for about 10 years. Some of the instructions for getting started were not clear, but a call to their 800 number support line quickly cleared it up my issue.
customer_reviews.author: et

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature, perfect strength, perfect crema!
customer_reviews.text: I have a feeling I found what I've been looking for in an espresso machine... I just received my new Juro yesterday; I read the instructions, and started the setup and cleaning. When ready, I made the first espresso... I didn't want to throw it away! I went on to make my next espresso... It was amazing! Strong as I like it, hot as I like it, and all the crema that I like! Now that I purchased the extra warranty, I'm hoping I'll never have to se it! At least, this is the first time I've had the first perfect espresso from the get-go!
customer_reviews.author: Ameridama

customer_reviews.title: An Amazing Cup of Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Yes....it is one heck of an expensive coffeemaker. However, if you love coffee as much as we do, it may be well worth it. It makes an AMAZING cup of coffee. Be sure to read and follow the setup and use instructions. It takes a little time and planning to get it setup and ready to use. And only use quality coffee beans. Our first cup was Lavazza Super-Crema beans (from Amazon). This is good strong coffee in any coffeemaker. In the C65 the Lavazza coffee was just amazing and off the charts. Then we used the expresso setting and made a Cuban Coffee. Again, an amazing cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Seldes

customer_reviews.title: Jura does it again!
customer_reviews.text: New model - We love it. Makes great coffee, very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: CGHare

product_meta.title: Jura 15068 IMPRESSA C65 Automatic Coffee Machine, Platinum
product_meta.description: Turn, press, enjoy - that's how easy it is to enter the world of impressa; with the one-switch operating concept of the rotary switch and the 11-language plain text display, it's easy to create the perfect Coffee every time. Thanks to the high-performance conical grinder, the beans are always freshly ground. The simple, compact design with its elegant Platinum finish gives the impressa C65 an imposing yet understated look in any surroundings.
feature_bullets: Simple operation - thanks to the one-switch operating concept of the smart rotary switch
Height-adjustable Coffee spout - the Height of the Coffee spout can be adjusted between 2.6 - 4.4 inches to allow any size of cup to be used
Fine foam frothier - the revolutionary fine foam technology ensures unique milk foam quality with a fine, feather-light consistency
Combination of striking clean lines, compact Dimensions, high-quality materials and uncompromising workmanship
Turn, press, enjoy - that's how easy it is to enter the world of impressa

Only Original Jura maintenance products Guarantee complete hygiene and protection. Only our protective formulas have been carefully optimized to suit the programmed and materials used in Jura automatic machines.
Do not buy products from unauthorized JURA dealers. Amazon is an authorized dealer.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
